algorithm_technique: Count digit frequencies, greedily build the palindrome from largest digits with even counts.
problem_summary_simple: Construct the largest palindromic number using digits from a given string.
problem_summary_technical: Use a frequency map to count digits, then greedily construct the palindrome by pairing digits from largest to smallest.
key_insights: The largest palindrome is formed by using the most frequent digits first.
Digits with even counts form pairs for the outer parts of the palindrome.
A single digit with an odd count can be placed in the center.
Handle leading zeros carefully, especially when the palindrome is just '0'.
